text: Juan Carlos Rojas Villegas (born 22 December 1981Cuando el futuro alcanzó a Rojas - Nación ) is a Costa Rican cyclist, who is currently suspended from the sport following a positive drugs test at the 2017 Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica. He won the 2013–14 UCI America Tour. ==Major results== ;2004 : 10th Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ::1st Stage 7 ;2005 : 1st Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ::1st Prologue, Stages 4, 5 (ITT) & 13 ;2006 : 1st Overall Vuelta a Guatemala ::1st Stages 8 & 9 : 2nd Road race, National Road Championships : 3rd Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ;2007 : 1st 20px Road race, National Road Championships : 1st Stage 2 (TTT) Tour of Nicaragua ;2009 : 1st Overall Vuelta a Guatemala ::1st Stages 3 & 6 (ITT) : 4th Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ::1st Stage 12 : 5th Overall Vuelta al Ecuador ;2010 : 1st 20px Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ::1st Stages 3, 6, 7 (ITT), 11 (ITT) & 12 : 3rd Road race, National Road Championships ;2011 : 3rd Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ;2013 : 1st 20px Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st 20px Mountains classification ::1st Stages 3, 7 (ITT), 10, 11 (ITT) & 12 ;2014 : 1st 2013–14 UCI America Tour : 1st 20px Road race, National Road Championships : 1st 20px Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st Stages 8 & 10 ;2015 : 1st 20px Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica : 2nd Time trial, National Road Championships : 9th Overall Tour do Rio ;2016 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Time trial ::2nd Road race : 2nd Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ::1st Stages 7 & 11 ;2017 : ~~1st 20px Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ::1st Stages 4, 5 (ITT) & 10~~ ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Costa Rican male cyclists
